variables.name: WALLABAG_POSTGRES_SERVER
variables.description: Server where the Wallabag PostgreSQL database is located.

variables.name: WALLABAG_POSTGRES_USER
variables.description: User used to connect to the Wallabag PostgreSQL database.

variables.name: WALLABAG_POSTGRES_PASSWORD
variables.description: Password used to connect to the Wallabag PostgreSQL database.

variables.name: WALLABAG_POSTGRES_DATABASE
variables.description: Name of the Wallabag PostgreSQL database.

variables.name: WALLABAG_INITIAL_USER
variables.description: Username of the initial Wallabag user.

variables.name: WALLABAG_INITIAL_PASSWORD
variables.description: Password of the initial Wallabag user.
